summary: Skeletonbeast.nif files to shape the bodies and all the armor of your beast races into a more beastlike shape. Now also a Giant Beast version...
descriptionHtml:
This is the plantigrade version of my reshaped beast races....


SOS SUPPORT BUT NOT NEEDED.

DESCRIPTION:
These are two skeleton files made to shape the bodies and all the armor of your beast races into a more beastlike shape. One skeleton for the males and one for the females. They will change the appearance of the Argonians and all the Khajiit.  My beast races are smaller but also bulkier and a little bent like they should walk on all fours.

It's incredible what a little file like this can do. Try it!

INSTALLATION:
I haven't made a "downloadmanagerfile" because there are only two nif files in the archive: just drop the extracted content(data folder) into your skyrim folder.

Remember only skeletons here!!!

To get your beast to look like the pictures you will need:

The wonderfull feet can be downloaded here:
Grimoas Plantigrade Feet For Beast Races
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16976/?

If you like a more realistic alternative for your argonian feet try... http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29479/?
(I love the dinosaur look though)

and

The reptilian tail:
BAT - Bigger Argonian Tails
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17339//?

Also you will need a nice Argonian/Khajiit skin. Pick one on the nexus.

My first mod; not much; but who cares?...

Don't forget to have fun... it's a game! :)
author: GododoG

files.name: ALSO OLD PREDIGIGRADE BUT NO BIG HEADS
